column5: Earlier today while smallie fishing my compre broke while fighting a fish i got it a bass pro last dec. I am going up north next week and dont want to buy a new rod and the warranty through shimano wont have a replacement by the time i leave. I was wondering if anyone knew if bass pro will do the over the counter warranty like they do in the states. Thanks for any help.
Good question.... I say call them up and find out.
Most shops will give you one over the counter,that is if its in stock!Shimano waranty is great!I usually wait a week or 2 to get mine back if its sent in.

I wouldn't bother if I were you, they may say yah on the phone and when you show up it may end up in a brawl.  Go to aikmans or to the place in peterborough, what you spend in gas you will save in agrivation.

Ok i talked to bass pro and the manager said they won't do it. I can't drive to Peterborough as i live in Dunnville so its a long way. Does anyone know the phone number for Shimano Canada all i can find on there website is a phone number that's in California. And what is aikmans?
Aikmans is the repair and warranty center for gta area, it's on dundas near Dixie

Aikman  A Sporting Goods Novar Road Mississauga, ON L5B 1S4 (905) 277-3595 it is at dundas and confederation pkwy( 5 & 10 area) it is great ,you just drop it on the counter he gives you a new one and that's it  travis
